name: Panel
description: Panel is a container with the optional content toggle feature.

toggleable.label: toggleable
toggleable.title: Defines if content of panel can be expanded and collapsed.

collapsed.label: collapsed
collapsed.title: Defines the initial state of panel content.

toggle-button-props.label: toggleButtonProps
toggle-button-props.title: Used to pass the custom value to read for the anchor inside the component.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

slots.name: header
slots.title: Custom content for the component's header.

slots.name: icons
slots.title: Custom content for the header's icon.

slots.name: togglericon
slots.title: Custom content for the component's toggler icon.

slots.name: footer
slots.title: Custom content for the component's footer.

events.name: toggle
events.title: Callback to invoke when a tab toggle.
